DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy CAT-2003 patient chylomicronemia . The study evaluate effect CAT-2003 fast total chylomicron triglyceride level , well postprandial total chylomicron triglyceride clearance . This single-blind study . All patient receive placebo 1 week , CAT-2003 12 week 13 week treatment period .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study To Assess CAT-2003 Patients With Chylomicronemia
DOC.criteria: Key Familial Chylomicronemia ( Fasting triglyceride ≥ 880 mg/dL Screening documented history plasma postheparin LDL activity < 20 % normal genetic confirmation homozygosity compound heterozygosity lossoffunction mutation familial chylomicronemiacausing gene ) OR Nonfamilial Chylomicronemia ( Fasting triglyceride ≥ 440 mg/dL Screening documented history fast triglyceride ≥ 880 mg/dL ) Key History major cardiovascular event within 6 month Screening Type I diabetes mellitus use insulin History pancreatitis within 3 month Screening
